properties.areaDesc: West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Flat Tops; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 14 at 1:22PM MST until February 17 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10-15
inches with higher amounts over 20 inches possible in the Park
Range.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains, Upper Yampa River Basin,
Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, West Elk and
Sawatch Mountains and Flat Tops.

* WHEN...From Saturday evening through Monday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially
on ridge tops and mountain passes. A detailed map of the
snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON
